item.title: Grown Turik
item.description:
Shadow Fairy

The longer you have this fairy by
your side in combat, the stronger
her elemental attack power
becomes.
(against monsters +/-15 levels)
This is added to your character's
elemental power.
The fairy can increase your
elemental power by up to 70%.
No experience is gained for
defeating NosVille monsters.

item.title: Varik
item.description:
Shadow Fairy

This fairy carries the concentrated
power of shadows within her.
The longer you have her by your
side in combat, the stronger her
elemental attack power becomes.
(against monsters +/-15 levels)
This is added to your character's
elemental power.
The fairy can increase your
elemental power by up to 80%.
No experience is gained for
defeating NosVille monsters.

item.description:
Feed your pet with this food
to have them automatically collect
fallen items. All items collected
will land in your inventory.
This option can only be
activated on NosMates
accompanying you.
Placing your pet in a bead
will cancel this option.

item.title: Wing of Return
item.description:
This amulet returns you to the
village. Your current location is
saved, and by using the Amulet of
Return, you can return to this
location again afterwards.

item.title: Amulet of Return
item.description:

you used the Wing of Return.

item.title: Bell of Sweet Home
item.description:

used the Bell of Sweet Home.
